entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow mixed with ice pellets changing to rain or snow this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing rain early this evening. Blowing snow early this evening. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 before morning. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 17 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Friday 10 February 2023
